评论详情: Not sure if weight is an indicator of quality but the heaviness of these surprised me. I will admit they were on sale for $10 when I bought them, but even if I had paid the full amount, they are nice enough! 28W 29L I'm 5'2 130lb These are baggy low riders on me There are also zippers at the bottom of the pant legs, not sure if for function or style. Big sturdy cargo and butt pockets but the hip pocket material is SUPER THIN, and I can see runs in it (like nylons) and I haven't even used them yet! Good
Cute details. Runs a little small.
I absolutely love these. I find them to be true to size. I’m normally an 8-10, 165ibs, 5’7, I ordered the 30X34. Perfect length for tall girls. The material is pretty thick and comfortable.

I get so many complements on these! They have a lower rise waist and the zipper at the ankles is great to flare them out a bit. They are a super thin material, I do wish they were a bit sturdier material, I’m not sure they’ll last long.

评论概述: False advertisement or Sent wrong size
评论详情: I’m just shy of 5’3 tall, 146 lbs, with an hourglass shape and I typically wear between a 6 and 8 (28 or 29) petite in women’s pants. Based upon reviews I sized up to a 30Wx 29L. FYI sizing is completely off. The waist fits fine but the upper thighs are a little snug. I assumed the length would be fine because a 29 inseam typically touches the ground on me, but I absolutely cannot wear these pants. they are clearly high waters and definitely not 29inches long. The pants I received are only 26.5 inches long inseam as you can see in the photo with the measuring tape although I purchased 29 inches L. Definitely order 2-3 sizes larger than your standard waist size and at least 3 inches longer than your standard inseam. Super disappointed because I wanted to wear these this weekend but can’t.

I have had these pants for over a year and I am obsessed. I don’t normally like the way pants fit on me but mine fit great and the quality of the pants are still good after regularly wearing them. If you are looking for cargo pants, get these pants.
Love love love these pants , good quality and stylish

I bought two because I liked so much, but pay attention to sizing. Some are short and fit right. Others are long enough and too baggy. I am 5'6" so I needed something for my legs because they are longer but I have a small waist only waying 125.
The fit is great and the material is nice! My husband loves the way that it fits and looks!

These pants are so cute to me, but they’re superrrr long ! I mean, so long that I’m walking on them. So I had to get mine altered in the waist and the inseam. But I was upset because once I paid $50 to get them altered to be a tad shorter, they shrunk after I washed them. So I had to UNDO the altering and stitch them back 😮‍💨 but they’re nice and heavy duty. The crotch is really long, though. No stretch, but has a few pockets. Overall, they’re decent pants.  **UPDATE** The seller reached out to me and sent me another pair. Their customer service was top tier ! The new pair fit really well because I requested a shorter length. And they didn’t shrink after washing, so I’m back to loving these cargos☺️
It arrived quickly, fit good , and the design and color was nice. Exactly what was listed and I was very happy with my purchase.
Cute but I didn’t end up using for rolling loud I returned instead

I'm a little bit bummed, because I am normally around a size 4 and these cargo pants in a 26 waist are simply far too large for me to even wear. I wore these to go out of town and I was not uncomfortable at all. I was very happy with this product.  I love the design and pockets.i am 53 and I weight 139 140 lbs.

These jeans have a kind of "urban" flair in both color and design. The camo frayed EVERYTHING (!) will step up your fashion style in the world of denim most definitely. I especially like the zipper on the bottom gives you control in allowing more flare.  I ordered the 26x30 and they fit like my usual US waist size 24/25, so I recommend sizing up if you're in between sizes.

We ordered the 26×32 sizing for our daughter. The waist fits well, the legs are a little longer than usual, but not too bad. The appearance is as depicted on the product listing, essentially a wide, straight leg, thick, worn-looking pair of camouflage pattern pants. The fasteners and stitching are decent, the camo material is medium weight. So for look, fit, style, etc, they are on the mark for the most part.  I think they are a little pricier than I would expect for these at just over $50 having no awareness of the brand, but compared to store-prices in 2024 they are not unreasonable if they meet your fancy. They have the "raw edge" styling that is not something I've seen before done this way. We like them.
True to size and great fit! If you’re looking for street style cargos these are the ones!
Great quality, durable fabric. Fits true to size. These will hold up well for sure.

I got these for my 12 year old nephew in the size 26 waist 30 length. The fit him nicely. He's tall and slim and the length gives him room to grow. The fabric is very hefty and thick. The pants are actually good for winter. The raw edges on cargos with wide legs is totally fashionable these days with the kiddos. The pants are very well made. I'm certain they'll look good a long time. We'll be able to pass them down later. Do not hesitate. Choose the right size and get them!

评论概述: Too Big for Wife, Little Snug for Me
评论详情: Just what the title says. I ordered these for my wife and they ended up being mine.  The fabric is nice and soft. The stitching is good. The raw frayed edges are a cool look.  For some reason we thought they’d fit my wife. They ended up ridiculously long on her. She says the legs are not wide enough to look flared on her, like they’re the same width from her thighs to her ankles.  I’m considerably bigger and these fit me though. The waistband is snugger than I would like and these feel so nineties retro I feel like I’m in the nineties again. But the length and the wide legs work for me.
My daughter gets stopped on the street, in restaurants and bars by people asking where she got them. Great fit, super comfortable.

评论概述: Stylish, Well-Made with Very Little Shrinkage from Laundering
评论详情: I ordered these pants one size larger, in black with a 32 inch waist and a 31 inch Inseam, on purpose because the style is Hip Hop.  I wanted them to be extra baggy and still be able to put them in the dryer.  These cargo pants are 100 percent cotton, and I have plenty experience laundering clothes.  Unless the clothes are made with pre-shrunk cotton by the manufacturer, you can expect shrinkage in the dryer.  These pants shrunk very little.The ‘streetware’ style of the pockets are exactly what you would expect in a cargo pant; the front pockets are very large and deep - 8 inches long and 6 1/2 inches wide.  The cargo pockets below have the traditional flap measuring a generous 8 inches wide and 3 inches long - the entire pocket is 8 inches x 8 inches, quite large.The straight leg on the pant has a 6 3/4 inch zipper  at the bottom of the pant on the outside of the leg area.  If you prefer a flared leg you can unzip the sides to allow for that particular look.  There are also back pockets measuring  5 inches x 5 inches.One design element unique to these pants is raw edgings, which gives the pants a unique style.  The zipper fly and metal button / buttonhole in front of the pants is the same as a typical  pair of jeans.  The cotton is a durable grade and the look is very stylish.These cargo pants are well made.  The seller recommends to hand wash only.  I actually turned them inside out because of the raw edge design and washed them in cold and put them in the dryer on low.  There was no problem laundering this pair of pants and there was very little shrinkage even though they are 100% cotton.

So for some reason when it said cotton I thought that these would be more like a pajama pant or something casual but they definitely feel more like jean material. I wear a women's size 16 and these fit me perfectly. They are cute and fun, they are super long.

I bought these in December and returned due to them being too short. The seller immediately reached out about my feedback and informed me that they would have longer fit available for end of January. I would say about average these are perfect for wearing platform boots or sneakers. Extremely comfortable not too thick not too far and they’re very flattering. Overall excellent quality and the customer service was great.

My style is more alternative/punk and these work great for that when I style it with a black crop. Definitely a great fit.  Please use the Fitting Chart provided and MEASURE YOURSELF. Use a Fabric measuring tape for the love of god.  Make sure if you look at reviews, to judge if their measurements are true. A lot of the ladies claim wider measurements than they are if you compare objects around them. They're beautiful girls though, very tiny, but thats it. Order based on your true size. The size chart is perfect.

评论概述: Trendy Cargos with Room to Spare
评论详情: These KGYA Cargo Pants are a solid choice for those seeking comfortable, stylish, and functional streetwear. The unique camo print, cargo pockets, and relaxed fit are sure to turn heads.  Eye-Catching Camo:  The autumn leaf camo print is unique and stylish, standing out from the usual olive drab. It definitely makes a statement.  Relaxed Fit: These pants are generously sized and offer a relaxed, oversized fit. Perfect for those who love a slouchy, streetwear vibe.  Cargo Convenience: Multiple pockets provide ample storage for essentials, phones, wallets, and whatever else you need on the go.  Surprisingly Comfortable: The cotton-spandex blend fabric is soft, breathable, and comfortable to wear for extended periods.  Raw Edge Detail: The raw edge hems add a touch of trendy detail, but be mindful of potential fraying over time.
Idk if I like the "raw edge" of them though. Its like wearing them inside out but not and seems wrong. The legs are very wide, and they're definitely longer than I expected despite being my size.

评论概述: The fit of the Unisex Camo Cargo Pants is comfortable and flattering
评论详情: The cargo pockets are one of the standout features of these pants. They not only add a distinctive style element but also provide ample storage space for your essentials. The pockets are deep and well-placed, allowing you to carry your phone, wallet, keys, and other small items securely. This convenient storage solution eliminates the need for additional bags or accessories, making these pants ideal for activities where you want to keep your hands free.  The fit of the Unisex Camo Cargo Pants is comfortable and flattering. The relaxed and slightly tapered leg provides a modern silhouette while allowing for ease of movement. The adjustable drawstring waistband ensures a customizable and secure fit for all body types. Additionally, the pants are available in a range of sizes, catering to both men and women.

I love these pants but have had a terrible experience with quality. It’s not consistent. I ended up ordering 2 because the first one had a hole on the back of the pant and the second one came with no front button?  I mean I love them and the fit so I will end up keeping one but I guess that’s what you can expect.
